frontmatter.title: Skiathos Maritime and Cultural Tradition Museum

node.excerpt: The museum is located in Skiathos, in the Cultural Community Centre of “Bourtzi” and was founded in 2015. The island of Skiathos was destined to play a crucial role in both our naval tradition and naval architecture due to its advantageous geographic…
